text: ( A ) Jurkat , Th2 cells , and human primary <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cells were transfected with an empty vector ( pGL3 basic ) or a vector containing the putative <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter region fused to the <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reporter gene .

Bars show the mean +/- SD of arbitrary light units normalized for renilla <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> of four independent experiments ; samples were measured in triplicates .

( B ) Naive <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> T cells were transfected with the <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter reporter construct together with a <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression vector or an empty vector .

( C ) Naive ( left panel ) or memory ( right panel ) <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> T cells were transfected with wild-type or a <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mutated 511 - <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter reporter construct and activated with PMA and ionomycin .

( D ) Nuclear extracts were prepared from HEK cells transfected with <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or an empty vector , ( E ) Th1 , Th2 , or iTreg cells and binding factors precipitated using biotinylated oligonucleotides .
The oligonucleotides - transcription factor complexes were separated on a SDS-PAGE gel .
The amounts of <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein in the precipitates were assessed by immunoblotting with anti - <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mAb .

Data are representative of three different experiments .
